content: प्रोथ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Famous, well-known. {@--2@} Placed, fixed. {@--3@} Travelling, going out on a journey, wayfaring; वृक्षांतमुदकांतं च प्रियं प्रोथमनुव्रजेत् <ls>Tv.</ls> --थः --थं {@--1@} The nose or nostrils of a horse; <ls>N. 1. 60</ls>; <ls>Śi. 11. 11</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">12. 73.</ls> {@--2@} The snout of a hog. --थः {@--1@} The hip, buttocks. {@--2@} An excavation. {@--3@} A garment, old clothes. {@--4@} Embrye. {@--5@} Terror, fright.
